BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management
Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Transportation

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting the days that alternate side of the street parking is in effect in residentially zoned districts.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Limiting the days that alternate side of the street parking is in effect in residentially zoned districts.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reducing department of sanitation street cleaning days.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reducing department of sanitation street cleaning days.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing vehicles to park on the restricted side of a street which is subject to alternate side parking rules without being ticketed if the owner is in the vehicle and able to move it or if the street has already been cleaned.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Alowing vehicles to park on the restricted side of a street which is subject to alternate side parking rules without being ticketed if the owner is in the vehicle and able to move it or if the street has already been cleaned.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Transportation
Oversight – Street cleaning and alternate side parking rules.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight – Street cleaning and alternate side parking rules.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Koppell, Van Bramer, Rodriguez, Vacca, Ignizio, Garodnick, Gonzalez, Lander, Rose, Koo, Mealy, Halloran, Brewer, Williams and Ulrich.

Items.Title: Oversight – Street cleaning and alternate side parking rules.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight – Street cleaning and alternate side parking rules.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting the days that alternate side of the street parking is in effect in residentially zoned districts.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Limiting the days that alternate side of the street parking is in effect in residentially zoned districts.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reducing department of sanitation street cleaning days.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reducing department of sanitation street cleaning days.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing vehicles to park on the restricted side of a street which is subject to alternate side parking rules without being ticketed if the owner is in the vehicle and able to move it or if the street has already been cleaned.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Alowing vehicles to park on the restricted side of a street which is subject to alternate side parking rules without being ticketed if the owner is in the vehicle and able to move it or if the street has already been cleaned.
